content: your hook again 3 yo and pull through 2 loops on your hook yo and pull through the remaining 2 loops on your hook beg dc3cl - into the indicated st or space join your yarn by making chain 2 yo into the same st or space insert your hook yo and pull up a loop yo and pull through 2 loops repeat one more in the same st or space 3 loops on your hook yarn over and pull through all 3 loops on your hook dc3cl - yo into the indicated st or space insert your hook yo and pull up a loop yo and pull through 2 loops repeat 2 more in the same st or space 4 loops on your hook yarn over and pull through all 4 loops on your hook fpdc2tog - yo insert your hook from front to back and back to front around the indicated stitch yo and pull up a loop yo and pull through 2 loops again yo insert your hook from front to back and back to front around the indicated next stitch yo and pull up a loop yo and pull through 2 loops 3 loops on your hook yarn over and pull through all 3 loops on your hook colourway colour a - deep pink × 1 balls colour b - autumn yellow × 1 balls colour c - aqua blue × 1 balls colour d - light yellow × 1 balls colour e - grass green × 1 balls 4 not� this pattern is for personal use only do not make any video tutorial without my permission you can t sell redistribute or edit this pattern in any way you can sell your finished products but you can t use my picture to promote them if you make my pattern and put photos of it on your blog or a website or your facebook page you should always credit me as the designer you may not reprint this design in a magazine or a book without asking me a design from the sky crochet copyright ©2022 sadika sobhan link� my ravelry store facebook discussion and workshop group the sky crochet pattern group instagram @sadika_sobhan 5 patter� instructio� round 1 colour a/deep pink into magic_ring beg with chain 3 count as double_crochet 3 double_crochet chain 1 into magic_ring * 4 double_crochet chain 1 * repeat from * to * 2 more times slip_stitch into 3rd chain of the beg chain 3 fasten o� do not tighten magic_ring at the end of this round total 16 double_crochet 4 chain 1 space round 2 colour a/deep pink join your yarn into any chain 1 space by making chain 3 count as double_crochet 3 double_crochet into the same space chain 6 into next chain 1 space make * 4 double_crochet chain 6 * repeat from * to * 2 more times slip_stitch into 3rd chain of the beg chain 3 fasten o� total 16 double_crochet 4 chain 6 space round
